item.title: Attachment Bonding System
item.description: Attachment Bonding System is a speculative service design aimed for future parents-children bonding revealing my concerns towards the intimate violence.

item.title: Fair Collaboration Platform
item.description: Fair Project Platform is my very first solo project. Although it’s kind of traditional, it involves the most complete design flow and detailed UI.

item.title: First Aid Hero
item.description: First Aid Hero is a school work of game app aiming to promote the knowledge of first aid.

item.title: Green Travel
item.description: Green Travel is a school work cooperation with Alipay to promote environmental-friendly way of traveling.

item.title: Handwashing Smart Mirror
item.description: Handwashing Smart Mirror is a team project led by me in the course of Digital Information Product.

item.title: Pee Mail Visualization
item.description: “Pee mail” Visualization is the miniature of my imaginary utopia where human beings and non-human animals are sharing their happiness.
